sentences.sContent: He was demoted to the rank of corporal.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was demoted to the rank of corporal.

sentences.sContent: He was advanced to the rank of corporal.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was advanced to the rank of corporal.

sentences.sContent: As punishment,the corporal was demoted to private.
sentences.sContent_eng: As punishment,the corporal was demoted to private.
sentences.sCn: 作为惩罚，这下士被降为士兵。

trans.tranOther: of or relating to the body; bodily
a low rank in the army, air force etc
